subject: Squeaking Brake Pedal.
description_text:
Hi,
Ref order number SSN2957. 

My Plus X pedals arrived on Friday and whilst they appear to work fine electrically, the brake pedal has a little free play at the start which makes it clunky when you start to brake, and after a few hours use it has developed a really horrible, very loud squeak! 

All bolts etc are tight, already checked that for the clunk. 

Can you please advise what to look at and also which part (if any) needs lubricating and which lubricant to use? 

Best Regards,
Stewart Sanderson

conversations.body_text: Hi Stewart Sanderson,    You may refer to the user manual for instructions on lubricating the pedal. If the issue persists, please provide a video demonstration and share it via Google Drive with access permissions enabled, so that we can analyze the problem further.
